db:info.db:title: Qt Quick 3D Physics - Material Example
db:info.db:edition: Qt Quick 3D Physics | Commercial or GPLv3

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += quick quick3d
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick3dphysics/material INSTALLS += target
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
RESOURCES += \ qml.qrc
OTHER_FILES += \ doc/src/*.*
